education_text.0: Edwin Earl Catmull (born March 31, 1945) is an American      Computer scientist computer scientist and animator who served as the founder of      Pixar and the President of      Walt Disney Animation Studios Walt Disney Animation StudiosIn June 2007, Catmull and time Pixar digital animator and director      John Lasseter John Lasseter were given control of      Disneytoon Studios Disneytoon Studios, a division of      redirect    Disney Animation Studio Disney Animation housed in a separate facility in GlendaleHis book
